General.Name: Patria Investments Ltd
General.Description: Patria Investments Limited operates as a private market investment firm focused on investing in Latin America. The company offers asset management services to investors focusing on private equity funds, infrastructure development funds, co-investments funds, constructivist equity funds, and real estate and credit funds. Patria Investments Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.
General.Address: 18 Forum Lane, Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands, KY1-9006
